title: Embedded JavaScript can't run in Service Portal
content:
After you configured an embedded JavaScript to Service Portal, the JavaScript cannot run properly.
The following error message is displayed:
Failed to load external script!

Possible causes

  • Cause 1: Your browser blocks the website when the certificate installed cannot be verified by the browser.
  • Cause 2: The embedded code cannot direct to the URL where the JavaScript is located.
  • Cause 3: The JavaScript isn't loaded.

Solution

  1. Make sure you have added the embedded JavaScript to Service Portal with URL included in the code.
  2. Access the JavaScript URL through your browser. If the Privacy error page is displayed, accept the certification as shown below.
  3. View page source through your browser. Verify the JavaScript is loaded under Head section.
